item.title: Error Connecting To Server PLEASE HELP : (
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:5, topic:407374”]You can, but you should connect to your server either 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 to stop most problems.[/quote] ahh . it didnt work do teamviewer with me please

item.title: Error Connecting To Server PLEASE HELP : (

item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“mr pker01, post:3, topic:407374”]Change the client ip address in Client.java, search for “server =” then set it to 127.0.0.1[/quote] arent i suppose to leave it on my server ip ?

item.title: Error Connecting To Server PLEASE HELP : (
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Change the client ip address in Client.java, search for “server =” then set it to 127.0.0.1
